brainly_data.question:
When a driver touches a cars steering wheel on a hot day heat is transferred to the drivers hand by

Radiation 

Conduction 

Electromagnetism 

Convection
brainly_data.subject: Physics

all_answers.question:
When a driver touches a cars steering wheel on a hot day heat is transferred to the drivers hand by

Radiation 

Conduction 

Electromagnetism 

Convection
all_answers.subject: Physics
all_answers.text:
Answer is B. Conduction

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Conduction is a heat it transferred to the heat by touching your hand. 


Hope it helped you.

-Charlie
